price: Pharaoh said, “Your messenger who has been sent to you is truly insane!”
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّ رَسُولَكُمُ ٱلَّذِيٓ أُرۡسِلَ إِلَيۡكُمۡ لَمَجۡنُونٞ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
